member.summary: Lists the synchronization stages which comprise a single synchronization procedure performed by a implementation.

member.name: F:Telerik.Windows.Cloud.SynchronizationStage.Synchronization
member.summary: Identifies the start of the synchronization procedure.

member.name: F:Telerik.Windows.Cloud.SynchronizationStage.LoadingLocalDataBase
member.summary: Identifies the stage at which local database is read. At this stage locally stored items are retrieved.

member.name: F:Telerik.Windows.Cloud.SynchronizationStage.DeletingItemsRemovedOnServer
member.summary: Identifies the stage at which items deleted on server are deleted locally.

member.name: F:Telerik.Windows.Cloud.SynchronizationStage.DeletingLocalItemsOnServer
member.summary: Identifies the stage at which items that are marked as deleted locally are deleted on the server.

member.name: F:Telerik.Windows.Cloud.SynchronizationStage.DeletingLocalItems
member.summary: Identifies the stage at which items marked as deleted and are not present on the server are deleted locally.

member.name: F:Telerik.Windows.Cloud.SynchronizationStage.MarkingItemsAsDeleted
member.summary: Identifies the stage at which items are marked as deleted locally.

member.name: F:Telerik.Windows.Cloud.SynchronizationStage.GettingNewAndUpdatedItemsFromServer
member.summary: Identifies the stage at which new or updated items are downloaded from the server and stored or updated locally.

member.name: F:Telerik.Windows.Cloud.SynchronizationStage.UpdatingLocalItemsOnServer
member.summary: Identifies the stage at which items that are marked as dirty in the local storage are updated on the server.

member.name: F:Telerik.Windows.Cloud.SynchronizationStage.CreatingLocalItemsOnServer
member.summary: Identifies the stage at which items that are new are created on the server.

member.name: F:Telerik.Windows.Cloud.SynchronizationStage.UpdatingItemsLocally
member.summary: Identifies the stage at which locally stored items are updated.

member.name: F:Telerik.Windows.Cloud.SynchronizationStage.CreatingItemsLocally
member.summary: Identifies the stage at which items are created locally.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Cloud.SynchronizationState
member.summary: Lists the possible synchronization states for a .

member.name: F:Telerik.Windows.Cloud.SynchronizationState.Unknown
member.summary: Synchronization is not known and the method should be called to acquire the needed information about the current synchronization state.

member.name: F:Telerik.Windows.Cloud.SynchronizationState.NotModified
member.summary: Item is not modified. There might be a newer version on the server.

member.name: F:Telerik.Windows.Cloud.SynchronizationState.Modified
member.summary: Item is modified locally and scheduled for update during the next synchronization procedure.

member.name: F:Telerik.Windows.Cloud.SynchronizationState.ScheduledForUpload
member.summary: Item is new, does not exist on the server and is scheduled for upload during the next synchronization procedure.

member.name: F:Telerik.Windows.Cloud.SynchronizationState.ScheduledForDeletion
member.summary: Item is scheduled for deletion during the next synchronization procedure.

member.name: F:Telerik.Windows.Cloud.SynchronizationState.Deleted
member.summary: Item has been deleted on the server.
